title: Gloria Dei Church National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Gloria Dei Church National Historic Site is open Tuesday-Sunday, from 9am to 4pm. It is closed on Mondays. Religious services are held on Sundays at 10am. Services and other special events may limit access to the interior of the historic church at times. Confirm church visiting hours by calling the rector at 215-389-1513. Visit the church's website for more information about hours and services.
